name: playhard's Fitocracy enhancements
description: My usability and style tweaks to the 3/28/2012 Fitocracy site redesign.
additional_info: Versions: * 03/31/2012 - v1 * 04/01/2012 - v2 - added some adjustments from FIE * 04/02/2012 - v3 - tile list of groups across the page * 04/03/2012 - v4 - removed drop shadow on avatar pics so right-click > view-image works * 05/15/2012 - v5 - a few tweaks for the new Duel page * 05/22/2012 - v6 - squeeze the mini-dash, minor duel page updates * 06/03/2012 - v7 - minor update to #duel-header for wide screens v1 Modifications: * fixed comment boxes so you can see what you're typing! * reduced font sizes * header colors * background colors * text colors * added scrollbars to long workouts * vertical white space adjustments * left sidebar width and position * adjustments for wider screens (1280px) * stats box always/never visible * achievement badge sizes (in profile and in stream) v2: Added a few things from the official FIE stylesheet: * bigger and colored notification bubble * highlight links on mouse-over * bigger profile pics * colored PRs v3: Make groups tile across the page on a user's profile. v4: * fixed typo from v3 * removed drop shadow on avatar pics so right-click > view-image works * removed a 1px border from the header (looked bad with modified bg colors) v5: * changed background colors a bit to go with the purple theme * other changes just fix issues caused by other mods in this stylesheet * make sure #duel-box text is white so you can read it * make mini-dash text white * set width on #duel-header so it centers properly * don't change size of avatars on duel page v6: * make the mini-dash a bit shorter * applied lighter background color to duel-box section * fixed width of stream items and "clear:both" in bottom section so dates get placed correctly (issue caused by this stylesheet) v7: * clear:both for #duel-header so it doesn't get pushed off screen to the right on very wide displays (issue caused by this stylesheet)
